2005-07-22

New Clientele album in September



The Clientele

Originally uploaded by grange85.

The new album from The Clientele is out on September 5th (a bit later in the USA). I managed to miss their show in London last night - I'll blame the terror attacks for wanting to stay at home but it really is nothing less than plain old laziness

NP: Television - Torn Curtain
